Brothers and sisters The news of a strong blizzard will hit the Levant, where the cold and snow will fall, and the temperature will reach 4 degrees.
I call on all international and humanitarian organizations and governments to stand with children and women in refugee camps. They will face the storm with tents and lack of food.
In the UAE my brother, Sheikh Khalifa, may God protect him by air bridge that includes urgent winter relief for these camps to help them overcome the suffering of the winter.
As we follow the implementation of his directives to start a humanitarian campaign to help the community to contribute to the alleviation of the winter cold on the affected in the Levant.
I call upon brothers and friends in the Arab and international media to shed light on this human tragedy and to contribute to the relief of the refugees

Terribly bumped by the horrible drama at Charlie Hebdo. All my thoughts are with the families of the victims.
The murders in Paris are sickening. We stand with the French people in the fight against terror and defending the freedom of the press.
I was deeply saddened by the fact that Kenan KUMAŞ was a martyr in the face of a terrorist attack.
I pray for the mercy of Allah, condolences to the painful family and the Police Organization to Kenan KUMAŞ, who is martyred for the security and peace of our country.
2014 was successful for our country. All the tasks facing the country have been successfully implemented.
No barbarous act will ever extinguish the freedom of the press. We are a united country that will react and stand together.
